jMash.YeastType.note: Neutral, clean and smooth.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Use for a clean malt flavor.

jMash.YeastType.note: Complex, oakey, fruity ester profile.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Use for low to medium gravity British ales.

jMash.YeastType.note: Bold citrusy character. Accenuates mineral/hop flavor.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Best suited for classic British Pale Ales or Bitters.

jMash.YeastType.note: Midly estery.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Recommended for strong or spiced ales.

jMash.YeastType.note: Complex, woody, almost musty ester profile.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Use for a real pub bitter profile.

jMash.YeastType.note: Hints of diacytel, full bodied, well rounded.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Highly recommended for Porters and Bitters.

jMash.YeastType.note: Very British tones with fruit-like esters.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Recommended for draft Bitter or Porter.

jMash.YeastType.note: Detectable amounts of diacetyl.
Subtle woody, oakey ester reminiscent of malt whisky.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Recommend for classic Scottish Heavy or Strong Ale.

jMash.YeastType.note: Big smooth fruity esters.
Vinous, almost lactic character.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Blends exceptionally well with roasted malts.

jMash.YeastType.note: Lightly fruity complex finish.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Porters, light Canadian Ales, British Bitters - Pale Ales

jMash.YeastType.note: Malty, bready, nutty character.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Extremely forgiving, can ferment well at high temps.

jMash.YeastType.note: Robust, estery with strong clove and fruit notes.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Recommended for general purpose Belgian Ales.

jMash.YeastType.note: Fruity and estery.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Particularly good for Doubles and Triples.

jMash.YeastType.note: Fruity, Spicy esters. A bit more refined than CL-300.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Recommended for classic Trappist Belgian Ales.

jMash.YeastType.note: Mild esters and spices reminiscent of apple pie.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Recommended for French, Belgian and Grand Cru Ale.

jMash.YeastType.note: Smooth attenuated, yet mild flavor.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: German Ale and Wheat Beer.

jMash.YeastType.note: Lager like finish, clean slightly yeasty flavor.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Mineral and malt character come through well.

jMash.YeastType.note: Threshold diacytel and esters.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: For classic US Microbrewery flavor.

jMash.YeastType.note: Subdued diacytel notes, attenuated finish.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Recommended for classic Czechoslovakian Pilsners.

jMash.YeastType.note: Very smooth, clean finish.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Use for you lightest, cleanest lagers.

jMash.YeastType.note: Clean, full-flavored finish.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Quite versatile, use in any lager for a big clean finish.

jMash.YeastType.note: Well rounded, subtle ester complex, citrus undertones.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Great for classic German Lager, Bock, Dunkel, Helles.

jMash.YeastType.note: Clean and crisp finish.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Forgiving, use for general purpose lagers.

jMash.YeastType.note: Clean, smooth rich almost creamy character.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Recommended for Marzens, Oktoberfests and Dunkels.

jMash.YeastType.note: Slightly estery, well attenuated.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Classic for California Common Beer.

jMash.YeastType.note: Soft, breaklike flavor. Midly estery finish.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Belgian Wit and Wheat beers.

jMash.YeastType.note: Intensely spicy, clovey and phenolic.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Use for Weizen and Weizenbocks.

jMash.YeastType.note: Milder than CL-920, mild clove and phenol character.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Use in Weizen and Weizenbocks.

jMash.YeastType.note: Clean finish.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Use for any classic unfiltered wheat beer.

jMash.YeastType.note: Produces a beer that is clean and well balanced.
Produces very complex, woody and full-bodied ale.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Sensory contribution in the tradition of English style ale

jMash.YeastType.note: Low concentrations of fruity and estery aromas.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Neutral for Ale yeast, allowing for malty profile.

jMash.YeastType.note: Estery to palate and nose, slight fresh yeast flavor.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Ales are described as full-bodied, fruity English Ales.
German Ales, Weizen and Wheat Beers - Top Crop
English Ales, Cask Conditioned Ales
German Lagers and Pilsen styles ers - Top Crop

jMash.YeastType.note: Fruity estery notes low 48F; Pilsner Flavors up to 59F

jMash.YeastType.note: superb flavors 60-75F 65-75F
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Mixed Style Ale/Lagers: Cream Ales, Kolsch, etc

jMash.YeastType.note: spicey,peppery flavors 65-75F
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Specialty Beers zen and Wheat Beers - Top Crop

jMash.YeastType.note: Produces a beer that is clean and well balanced.
Produces very complex, woody and full-bodied ale.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Sensory contribution in the tradition of English style ale

jMash.YeastType.note: Low concentrations of fruity and estery aromas.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Neutral for Ale yeast, allowing for malty profile.

jMash.YeastType.note: Estery to palate and nose, slight fresh yeast flavor.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Ales are described as full-bodied, fruity English Ales.

jMash.YeastType.note: some fruity esters, attenuative
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Fair to good reputation

jMash.YeastType.note: Slight diacetyl, complex, woody, bold

jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Use for almost any ale.

jMash.YeastType.note: Leaves behind residual sweetness from malt.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Best for English style ales, Milds, Bitters, Porters, Stout

jMash.YeastType.note: Clean but more estery than WLP029. Sulfur compnt.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Does not ferment well below 62 F

jMash.YeastType.note: Slight hint of diacetyl, balanced with light fruitiness.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Great for Irish Ales, Stouts, Porters, Browns, Reds.

jMash.YeastType.note: Produces very malty beers.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Excellent for all English Style Ales.

jMash.YeastType.note: Distinctive ester profile. Ferments dry.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Good choice for most English style ales.

jMash.YeastType.note: Clean, similar to WLP002 but more attenuative.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Well suited for high gravity beers.

jMash.YeastType.note: Neutral, possibly slightly tart.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Great for golden, blonde, honey and German Alt styles.

jMash.YeastType.note: Clean, pleasant ester character, bready.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Can ferment clean and successfully at higher temps.

jMash.YeastType.note: Clean profile. Very little ester and sulfur production.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Good for Alt, Kolsch, malty English ales and fruit beers.

jMash.YeastType.note: Complex, oakey ester character.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Well suited for British Ales.

jMash.YeastType.note: Fruity Apple, Clover Honey and Pear.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: From the famous town of Burton, upon Trent.

jMash.YeastType.note: Complex fruit and citrus flavors.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Great for British bitters and pale ales.

jMash.YeastType.note: Mild but complex estery character. Ferments dry.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: From Straffordshire, England. Well suited - high gravity.
Use to reproduce Scottish style ales.

jMash.YeastType.note: Super clean.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Slight sulfur produced during fermentation.

jMash.YeastType.note: Produces signature English ester character.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Leaves ale with slightly sweet malt charater.

jMash.YeastType.note: Produces clean, slightly sweet alt beers.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Does not accentuate hop flavor as well as WLP029.

jMash.YeastType.note: Fruitier than WLP001.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Will produce fuller bodied beer than with WLP001.
Can ferment up to 25 percent alcohol. From England.

jMash.YeastType.note: Banana, clove nose.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Traditional German Wheat Beers.

jMash.YeastType.note: Does not produce banana, clove notes.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Used for Oregon Style American Hefeweizen.

jMash.YeastType.note: Large clove, phenolic aroma/flavor. Minimal banana.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Sulfur production higher than WLP300

jMash.YeastType.note: Slightly phenolic and tart.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: For belgian Wit (white) beer.

jMash.YeastType.note: Less phenolic than WLP400 and more spicy.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Use to produce Belgian Wit, Spiced Ales, Specialty.

jMash.YeastType.note: Distinctive fruitiness and plum characteristics.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Excellent for high gravity beers, dubbels, trippels.

jMash.YeastType.note: Silimat to WLP500 but less fruity and more alc tolorent.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Used to produce Trappist style beers.

jMash.YeastType.note: Phenolic and spicy flavors dominate profile.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Saisaons, Belgian Ales, Belgian Reds, Browns, Whites

jMash.YeastType.note: Produces earthy,, peppery and spicy notes.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Dry with alternative yeast 75% into ferment, high grav.

jMash.YeastType.note: Combination of fruity and phenolic dominate the profile.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: From East Flanders, a very versatile Belgian yeast.
Classic yeast used to produce champagne.

jMash.YeastType.note: Slightly fruity.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Slightly less attentuative than WLP715.

jMash.YeastType.note: Slight ester production, low sulfur production.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: A good choice for white and blush wines.

jMash.YeastType.note: Neutral. Low fusel alcohol production. Ferments dry.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Cabernet, Shiraz, Pinot Noir, Sauvignon Blanc, Semillo

jMash.YeastType.note: Excellent for full bodied red wines. Ester complements.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Also suited for Merlot, Chardonnay, Chenin Blanc.

jMash.YeastType.note: Ferments dry but retains flavor of apples.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Classic cider yeast.

jMash.YeastType.note: Somewhat dry, malty finish.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Best suited for European Pilsner production.

jMash.YeastType.note: Dry and crisp, vey low diacetyle production.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: From the Southern Czech Republic.

jMash.YeastType.note: Produces a very malty, bock like style.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Does not finish as dry as WLP830.

jMash.YeastType.note: Very malty and clean.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Great for German Lagers, Pilsner, Oktoberfest, Marzen

jMash.YeastType.note: Characterized by malty finish and balanced aroma.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Produces slight sulfur, diacetyl.

jMash.YeastType.note: Dry and clean with very slight apple fruitiness.
jMash.YeastType.descrizione: Use for classic American lagers.

jMash.YeastType.note: Very low diacetyl and sulfur production.

jMash.YeastType.note: Finishes malty with slight ester profile.

jMash.YeastType.note: Clean and Crisp.

jMash.YeastType.note: Dry and crisp.

jMash.YeastType.note: Banana-estery. Clove-like phenolics.

jMash.YeastType.note: Dry and crisp. Slightly tart.

jMash.YeastType.note: Mildly malty and slightly fruity fermentation profile.
